About Us

Ondas is a state of the art decentralized gaming platform that represents a paradigm shift in the way gamers interact with the world.

Gamers and gaming enthusiasts everywhere can now engage in their favorite hobby with the added thrill of earning money.

NFT in-game assets that gamers earn can be converted into crypto using Ondas tokens.

NFT in-game assets that gamers earn can be converted into crypto using Ondas tokens.

For players

Ondas elevates your gaming experience to a more exciting level. You already know the thrill of getting a headshot in Call of Duty, or scoring a goal in Rocket League. What if the items you won in games could be sold for real money?

Ondas games bring a brand new experience to what you know & love about gaming, integrating a state of the art NFT asset trading platform.

For investors

Ondas gives investors the opportunity to make returns in multiple ways. Our multifaceted income methods for investors permit far higher potential returns than other similar platforms, along with a more stable stream of passive income.

At Ondas, investors pride themselves in the fact that they are backing something real, and with utility - indie game developers & new games benefit the entire gaming community at large.

At Ondas, investors pride themselves in the fact that they are backing something real, and with utility - indie game developers & new games benefit the entire gaming community at large.

For developers

Unless you’re already part of a big studio, getting your own game developed can be extremely difficult.

Not only is it hard work - there are also large financial barriers in place. No matter how great an idea may be, it’s often hard to get it kicked off without investing a large sum of money from your own pocket.

Not only is it hard work - there are also large financial barriers in place. No matter how great an idea may be, it’s often hard to get it kicked off without investing a large sum of money from your own pocket.

To learn more about the proposal and developer funding process, click here
To view the treasury pool, click here
  • Draft your game proposal
    Make it exciting - gamers should want to play your game when they see your proposal!
  • Submit the game proposal
    Your proposal will then go through a decentralized voting process, where token holders shall vote on whether or not your proposal goes through.
  • If your proposal gets accepted
    Congratulations, most of the gaming community agrees that your game will be epic, which means that you will be provided with funds..
  • Once your game is ready
    The game will be integrated into the Ondas Universe, giving you access to a ready-made pool of excited players.

Ondas Ecosystem

The Ondas ecosystem, powered by our native token, is designed to automatically invest a portion of each platform payout to liquidity pools for predefined periods. This creates buying pressure (via the autobuy system) and scarcity (as circulating supply is reduced by the token lock), thus adding support to the token market.

The Ondas ecosystem, powered by our native token, is designed to automatically invest a portion of each platform payout to liquidity pools for predefined periods. This creates buying pressure (via the autobuy system) and scarcity (as circulating supply is reduced by the token lock), thus adding support to the token market.

The Ondas ecosystem, powered by our native token

Read More

Roadmap

We are positioning ourselves as a gaming-experience provider that will build a complex one-stop platform for in-house developed games, third-party casino operators, e-sports, on-chain events betting, collaboration games developed via our Launchpad program, and much more.

Apart from developing games and mobile applications, Ondas will be experimenting with on-chain solutions to give players the option to test ongoing technological innovations in the gaming industry brought forward and voted on by the community.
